```{r}
library(tidyverse)
# Set parameters
T <- 1
n <- 1000
dt <- T/n
t <- seq(0, T, length.out = n+1)

# Generate Brownian motion increments
Bt_In <- rnorm(n, mean = 0, sd = sqrt(dt))

# Compute Brownian motion path
B_t <- c(0, cumsum(Bt_In))

# Plot the Brownian motion
plot(t, B_t, type = "l", col = "blue", lwd = 2, 
     xlab = "Time", ylab = "B(t)", 
     main = "Brownian Motion Simulation")
grid()


```

```{r}
# Set parameters
T <- 1
n <- 1000
dt <- T/n
t <- seq(0, T, length.out = n+1)

# Simulate Brownian motion
set.seed(123)  # For reproducibility
W <- c(0, cumsum(rnorm(n, mean = 0, sd = sqrt(dt))))

# Plot the Brownian motion
plot(t, W, type = "l", col = "blue", lwd = 2, 
     xlab = "Time", ylab = "W(t)", 
     main = "Brownian Motion Simulation")
grid()

```
```{r}
SHT <- function(a,b,n,dt=0.01)
  tao=min(a,b:W)
```
